headline: Xylem's Jill Boudreau Joins Water Systems Council Board of Directors
summary: June 26, 2025 – The Water Systems Council (WSC), the only national nonprofit organization solely focused on household wells and small water well systems, has announced the appointment of Jill Boudreau, Director of Inside Sales for Xylem, to its Board of Directors.
